mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM category_brand cb INNER JOIN brand b ON b.id=cb.brand_id WHERE cb.category_id=#{categoryId} AND cb.is_deleted=0 ORDER BY cb.id DESC
mapper.update: update category_brand set update_time = now() , is_deleted = 1 where id = #{id}

update category_brand set
brand_id = #{brandId},
category_id = #{categoryId},
update_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into category_brand ( id, brand_id, category_id, create_time, update_time , is_deleted ) values ( #{id}, #{brandId}, #{categoryId}, now(), now(), 0 )
